item.description:
The Mix CT is a really good 80's rock cover band . Groups like Journey, Rush etc.

The Mix will be rockin Stonebridge again!

Karen will have a table/ booth in front of the band with a sign that says Party Express and a balloon. She will be there by 9pm look for the sign or the red hair! Karen called Stonebridge --- no cover charge!

They will offer us $1 off drinks if we tell them we are with the meetup group from 9-12midnight. I listed this as a meetup with the bartenders since I am also offering it on Party Express.

You can contact Karen on her cell: 203-828-8235 if you need to find her.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Karen, contact and location info in description below...
item.name: Let's rock the house with the Mix CT at Stonebridge!
